metadata.title: CVE-2020-2254 jenkins-2-plugins/blueocean: Path traversal vulnerability in Blue Ocean Plugin could allow to read arbitrary files (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugin 1.23.2 and earlier provides an undocumented feature flag that, when enabled, allows an attacker with Job/Configure or Job/Create permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
